title: In Green Pastures: A Frontier Novel
description: In Colorado Territory 1872, Charlie learns he's a millionaire. He once again leaves his cozy mountain ranch, riding the train to Missouri. He encounters Jesse James outlaws, rogue relatives, baffling romance, and skeletons in the family closet. These adventures test Charlie's young manhood, skills, and faith in ways that will entertain and inspire readers of all ages.
author: Donna Westover Gallup
